name: 001 (America) D-Rank 2021
description: Animated gif containing all seven characters in D-Rank from 001 (America) OBJKT#29730. Classic video game imagery with every pixel replaced by a QR code linking to a tweet. The tweets embedded inside each video game character share one key word, the undisclosed title of that character. First exhibited at TedXLondon. (@MDKtmNFT) 1000 X 800 pixels / 193 KB / 7 frame gif
